import React from "react"; const options = [ { name: "legs", img: "https://s3-us-west-2.amazonaws.com/s.cdpn.io/1376484/legs.svg" }, { name: "cushions", img: "https://s3-us-west-2.amazonaws.com/s.cdpn.io/1376484/cushions.svg" }, { name: "base", img: "https://s3-us-west-2.amazonaws.com/s.cdpn.io/1376484/base.svg" }, { name: "supports", img: "https://s3-us-west-2.amazonaws.com/s.cdpn.io/1376484/supports.svg" }, { name: "back", img: "https://s3-us-west-2.amazonaws.com/s.cdpn.io/1376484/back.svg" } ]; export const ImageMenu = ({ activeOption, setActiveOption }) => { console.log("imageMenu"); return (
{options.map(({ name, img }, idx) => ( setActiveOption(name)} key={name} > ))}
); };
